sentences.en: A formless void is a prevalent cognition when people think of the creation of universe. Furthermore, it offers a philosophical ontic conception.

sentences.en: So government publicity is government ontic being, but not public entity or idiographic publicity.
sentences.cn: 因而公共性是政府的实体性存在，而非公共实体和具体的公共性。

sentences.en: The paper introduces the work principle of CPC system on the pass-line, and analyses the producing reasons, varieties and adjusting demands for ontic vice of the CPC system.
